name: Q&A Accuracy Rubric
description: Comprehensive rubric for evaluating question-answer pairs

scoring_guide.0.2-0.4: Mostly incorrect with some accurate elements
scoring_guide.0.4-0.6: Partially correct but missing key information

criteria.name: completeness
criteria.description: How thoroughly the answer addresses the question

scoring_guide.0.0-0.2: Answer is incomplete and misses main points
scoring_guide.0.2-0.4: Answer addresses some aspects but lacks depth
scoring_guide.0.6-0.8: Answer is thorough with minor gaps

criteria.name: clarity
criteria.description: How clear and understandable the answer is

scoring_guide.0.4-0.6: Generally clear with some unclear sections

criteria.name: relevance
criteria.description: How relevant the answer is to the specific question

scoring_guide.0.2-0.4: Answer has some relevance but goes off-topic
scoring_guide.0.8-1.0: Answer directly and perfectly addresses the question
